marginalia.anchor_text: indemo[n]stratiuis scie[n]tijs no[n] fiu[n]t p[ar]alogismi in dictio[n]e. secu[n]do cen extra dictione[m]

position.marginalia_text: In Mathematicis et demo[n]stratiuis scie[n]tijs, no[n] fiu[n]t parallogismi in dictione, aut extra dictionem:
Mathematica disciplina in p[ri]mo gradu certitudinis

marginalia.translation: The mathematical discipline is first and foremost about certainty

marginalia.anchor_text: in demo[n]stratiuis scie[n]tijs no[n] accidit deceptio p[er] fallacia[m] extra dictione[m]

position.marginalia_text: Fallacia[m] extra dictionem no[n] committi in demo[n]stratiuis scie[n]tijs

underline.text: p[ro]bat hoc duplicit[ur] p[ri]mo q[ue] indemo[n]stratiuis scie[n]tijs no[n] fiu[n]t p[ar]alogismi in dictio[n]e. secu[n]do cen extra dictione[m]
Sicut hoc nome[n] circulus equiuoce dicit[ur] de figura [et] poemate
deceptio excludit[ur] p[er] hoc q[uod] mediu[m] sc[ilicet] circul[us] demo[n]strat[ur] ad sensum. ita
intellectu[m] cu[m] a[ni]m aliquid diffinit[ur] ita se hab[et] ad intellectu[m] sicut illud q[uod] sensibilit[er] describit[ur]
qua[m]uis alie sc[i]e[n]tie p[er] rationes disputant mathematic[us] v[er]o sensibiliter lineis in puluere descriptis. Illos
causa est que p[re]cesserat q[uod] angulus extrinsecus valet duos
accidit deceptio p[er] fallacia[m] extra dictione[m] sicut nec in dictio[n]e q[uod] demo[n]strauimus. Et
quom[od]o sume[n]da sit instantia c[on]tra silogismu[m] demonstratiuu[m]
no[n] potest esse palogism[us] s[e]c[un]d[u]m fallatia[m] extra dictione[m]
Cum om[n]is p[ro]positio demo[n]stratiua in om[n]ibus sit [et] v[niversa]lis. ex vniuersali[bus]
